sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ProfileService } from '../profile.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-profile', templateUrl: './edit-profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-profile.component.scss'] }) export class EditProfileComponent { user:any profileForm: FormGroup; constructor(private profileservice:ProfileService, private router:Router,private formBuilder: FormBuilder,private activate:ActivatedRoute){ let userID = this.activate.snapshot.params['id']; this.profileForm = this.formBuilder.group({ profile_img: '', username: '', firstname: '', lastname: '', email: '', mobile: '', dob: ['', Validators.required], gender: ['', Validators.required], city: ['', Validators.required], country: ['', Validators.required], }) this.profileForm.patchValue({ username: this.user.username, firstname: this.user.firstname, lastname: this.user.lastname, email:this.user.email, mobile: this.user.mobile }); } ngOnInit(){} fatchUserDetails(userId:any){ this.authser } createProfile(data:any){ this.profileservice.createProfile(data).subscribe((res:any)=>{ console.log(res) }, (err:any)=>{ console.log(err) }) } }
